Posts.Content: always_smile21 wrote: I had a lumpectomy 1 week ago from today, so Oct. 2. I have my follow up with my surgeon tomorrow. I am only 21 years old. I'm so anxious and nervous to get the results back. They believe it was a Fibroadenoma, so I am hoping for the best and staying positive. That's really all anyone can do. I don't know a whole lot about this topic so I was hoping to get some help. The incision seems to have healed quite quickly and well, however I noticed a harness underneath it, where the lump was. Is this normal? Scar tissue perhaps? Surgery 10/2/2013 Lumpectomy: Left Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy (1 week ago today) always_smile21 always_smile21
